h3.a: Due to the Wisconsin Safer at Home order, the Marion School District is closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. Click here for more COVID-19 school closure information and academic resources.

img.style: left: 516px; top: 22px; width: 263px; height: 91px; float: left;

div.div: The 2020-21 District Academic Calendar was approved by the Board of Education on Monday, January 13th and can be found by clicking in the Calendars menu of the district website.
div.a: Read More About 2020-21 District Academic Calendar

div.p: Welcome to the Marion School District - home to the Marion Mustangs! The Marion School District serves 480 students in grades PK-12 from Marion, Wisconsin, the local communities of Caroline, Big Falls, Leopolis, Pella, and the surrounding rural areas in Shawano and Waupaca counties. Marion offers students a high quality comprehensive education in a small school environment, along with all of the benefits that, including small class sizes, responsive instruction with quick access to instructional supports, a high quality special education department for students with special needs, and a music and arts program district-wide. Explore our website and see what we have to offer!
